1.1.name: wordpress/ezyonlinebookings-online-booking-system
1.1.description:
The easy and powerful online booking system

EzyOnlineBookings is an easy to setup and easy to use, yet powerful and flexible online booking system.

This plugin lets your customers make bookings on your Wordpress website quickly and easily without the hassles of creating accounts. EzyOnlineBookings offers a modern and stylish booking calendar which looks professional and makes online bookings a breeze for your customers.

The booking system is fully flexible, yet easy to setup and use. It can be used for any appointment-based business, and gives you the power to fully control your availability and booking calendar. The system can integrate with Google calendar, and can give your customers the option to pay for bookings with PayPal.

EzyOnlineBookings features

EzyOnlineBookings features include:

  • Easy setup process
  • Full 2-way Google calendar integration
  • PayPal int
